channel.title: [PI] How to change droprates and change home tele?
channel.description:
Hello guys,
So basically I have stopped trying to get that 614 server to work, I guess I don't have enough knowledge so I decided to start with a PI 317 cause i have been told to it's great for learning.
So I already moved the spawn to the place I wanted, added shops, moved them there also and made myself owner. But.. Now I'm looking in NPCDrops.TSM under abyssal demons, cause I want the drop rate of a whip increased. the item ID is 4151 for a whip if i am right.
But it says 4151:1 which means whenever it drops a whip, it drops 1 at a time, correct? But i cant seem to find the RATE it spawns, like 1 out of 10, 1 out of 20, etc.
to give u an idea of how it looks, it looks like this: (NPCDrops.TSM
#abyssal demon 1615:43 556:150 560:70 379:3 1373:1 1201:1 1618:2 562:50 1149:1 1319:1 1113:1 1147:1 1622:3 2364:3 1249:1 892:50 1247:1 1620:3 565:50 995:10000 1615:1 830:1 1185:1 563:50 1624:3 2366:1 4151:1
Also, I want to change the home teleport spell to my spawn instead of going it to edgeville. Anyone knows how to do this?
TL;DR: Where is the droprate for an abyssal demon's whip and how to change it? I changed the " 995" drop of a rock crab from 450 to 1000000. so now it's 995:1000000, now whenever it drops coins, it drops 1m?? Where to change the home teleport spell to my starter spawn?
Thanks

item.title: [PI] How to change droprates and change home tele?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

dylan.hurley:

Umm for drops you could list it twice I guess I’m not sure but in clicking buttons file search for the coord you get teleported to and just change the coords

No, in config.java youll se it. Home teleport, death spawn, and start point.

Edit: repped you as you fixed a problem yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to change droprates and change home tele?

item.title: [PI] How to change droprates and change home tele?
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

this is an example:

#NPCNAME NPCID:%% &&&&:##

NPCNAME is the, NPC name.
NPCID, is of course, the npc id.
%%, is the percentage the item is dropped.
&&&& is the item id.

is how much of the item is dropped. plug in the numbers

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to change droprates and change home tele?

item.title: [PI] How to change droprates and change home tele?

item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

Hello guys,

So basically I have stopped trying to get that 614 server to work, I guess I don’t have enough knowledge so I decided to start with a PI 317 cause i have been told to it’s great for learning.

So I already moved the spawn to the place I wanted, added shops, moved them there also and made myself owner.
But… Now I’m looking in NPCDrops.TSM under abyssal demons, cause I want the drop rate of a whip increased. the item ID is 4151 for a whip if i am right.

But it says 4151:1 which means whenever it drops a whip, it drops 1 at a time, correct?
But i cant seem to find the RATE it spawns, like 1 out of 10, 1 out of 20, etc.

to give u an idea of how it looks, it looks like this: (NPCDrops.TSM

#abyssal demon
1615:43 556:150 560:70 379:3 1373:1 1201:1 1618:2 562:50 1149:1 1319:1 1113:1 1147:1 1622:3 2364:3 1249:1 892:50 1247:1 1620:3 565:50 995:10000 1615:1 830:1 1185:1 563:50 1624:3
2366:1 4151:1

Also, I want to change the home teleport spell to my spawn instead of going it to edgeville. Anyone knows how to do this?

TL;DR:
Where is the droprate for an abyssal demon’s whip and how to change it?
I changed the " 995" drop of a rock crab from 450 to 1000000. so now it’s 995:1000000, now whenever it drops coins, it drops 1m??

Thanks
